guide.title: Leadership Patterns and Guidelines
guide.abstract: Leadership should be an intuitive process and heavily depends on the people putting their emotions, experiences and expectations in this process.

body.p: Leadership should be an intuitive process and heavily depends on the people putting their emotions, experiences and expectations in this process.

True and good leadership makes a significant difference to the atmosphere in a project. The positive output of a project increases when leadership is taking place in a structured manner. It should also be noted that the power of a decision making process should not be overloaded with project management tasks like time scheduling, task scheduling and workload balancing.
Project leads should concentrate on communication with their team. Most of the time should be spent on consulting and effective skill management of their project members.

This does not mean a project lead cannot work in the team he is leading, it should mean that she or he should be expecting and willing to spend more than 80% of their time coordinating contacts and human relations among the members of the project and also consider this an important task.
